attributes.action: hold another weapons amnesty to try and get more guns and knifes off of the streets in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 2006 more than 10,000 knives and other weapons were handed in under a UK-wide knife amnesty. We call for another UK-wide weapon amnesty to take place to get more off of our streets.
